headline.print_headline: Detroit Resumes Shutting Off Water Service
headline.main: Detroit Resumes Shutting Off Water Service

docs.snippet: Bankrupt Detroit resumed shutting off water to people who have not paid bills after a month long suspension that followed international and local criticism that the practice was unduly harsh to residents of one of the nation's poorest cities....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bankrupt Detroit resumed shutting off water to people who have not paid bills after a month long suspension that followed international and local criticism that the practice was unduly harsh to residents of one of the nation's poorest cities.

headline.print_headline: Telecom Italia to Go Ahead With Bid for Vivendi's GVT
headline.main: Telecom Italia to Go Ahead With Bid for Vivendi's GVT

docs.snippet: Telecom Italia will make a bid valued at roughly 7 billion euros ($9.2 billion) for Vivendi's Brazilian broadband unit GVT, which would leave Vivendi with a 15 to 20 percent stake in the Italian group, said four people familiar with the matter....
docs.lead_paragraph: Telecom Italia will make a bid valued at roughly 7 billion euros ($9.2 billion) for Vivendi's Brazilian broadband unit GVT, which would leave Vivendi with a 15 to 20 percent stake in the Italian group, said four people familiar with the matter.

docs.snippet: A collection of comments posted to our article about people who are moving out of Brooklyn because of rising real estate prices....
docs.lead_paragraph: A collection of comments posted to our article about people who are moving out of Brooklyn because of rising real estate prices.

headline.print_headline: Jamaica Kincaid Wins American Book Award
headline.main: Jamaica Kincaid Wins American Book Award

docs.snippet: Author Jamaica Kincaid and film critic Armond White are among the winners of the 35th annual American Book Awards, which celebrate multiculturalism and free expression....
docs.lead_paragraph: Author Jamaica Kincaid and film critic Armond White are among the winners of the 35th annual American Book Awards, which celebrate multiculturalism and free expression.

headline.print_headline: 2004 US Open Champ Kuznetsova Loses in 1st Round
headline.main: 2004 US Open Champ Kuznetsova Loses in 1st Round

docs.snippet: Svetlana Kuznetsova lost her first-round match at the U.S. Open for the first time since 2005, the year she was the tournament's defending champion....
docs.lead_paragraph: Svetlana Kuznetsova lost her first-round match at the U.S. Open for the first time since 2005, the year she was the tournament's defending champion.

headline.print_headline: Sarkisian: USC Looking Into Shaw's Heroic Story
headline.main: Sarkisian: USC Looking Into Shaw's Heroic Story

docs.snippet: Southern California coach Steve Sarkisian says the school is investigating defensive back Josh Shaw's claim that he injured both of his ankles jumping off a balcony to save his nephew from drowning....
docs.lead_paragraph: Southern California coach Steve Sarkisian says the school is investigating defensive back Josh Shaw's claim that he injured both of his ankles jumping off a balcony to save his nephew from drowning.

headline.print_headline: Malzahn: Johnson Will Start for Auburn at QB
headline.main: Malzahn: Johnson Will Start for Auburn at QB

docs.snippet: Jeremy Johnson will be No. 6 Auburn's starting quarterback against Arkansas, and Nick Marshall will play in the game at some point....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jeremy Johnson will be No. 6 Auburn's starting quarterback against Arkansas, and Nick Marshall will play in the game at some point.

headline.print_headline: Officials: Girl Accidentally Kills Gun Instructor
headline.main: Officials: Girl Accidentally Kills Gun Instructor

docs.snippet: A 9-year-old girl accidentally killed an Arizona shooting instructor as he was showing her how to use an automatic Uzi, authorities said Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A 9-year-old girl accidentally killed an Arizona shooting instructor as he was showing her how to use an automatic Uzi, authorities said Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: What's in the Gaza Peace Deal?
headline.main: What's in the Gaza Peace Deal?

docs.snippet: Israel and the Palestinians agreed on Tuesday to an Egyptian-brokered plan to end the fighting in Gaza after 50 days of combat in which more than 2,100 Palestinians, most of them civilians, 64 Israeli soldiers and five civilians in Israel were kil...
docs.lead_paragraph: Israel and the Palestinians agreed on Tuesday to an Egyptian-brokered plan to end the fighting in Gaza after 50 days of combat in which more than 2,100 Palestinians, most of them civilians, 64 Israeli soldiers and five civilians in Israel were killed.

headline.print_headline: Hull Sign Defender Dawson From Spurs
headline.main: Hull Sign Defender Dawson From Spurs

docs.snippet: Hull City have signed England defender Michael Dawson on a three-year contract from Tottenham Hotspur, the Premier League club said on their website (www.hullcitytigers.com) on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Hull City have signed England defender Michael Dawson on a three-year contract from Tottenham Hotspur, the Premier League club said on their website (www.hullcitytigers.com) on Tuesday.
